reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Participation of environmental organizations in the 2012 Annual Meeting of the American Network of Birdlife International

description.narrative: This project supports the participation of six representatives of different Latin American environmental organizations in the Annual Meeting of the American Network of Birdlife International that is held in Dominican Republic 4-8 June 2012. The aim is to s upport the networking of the environmental organizations of the developing countries. The supported representatives come from Belize Ecuador Panama Peru and Dominican Republic. Finding covers costs of travel accommodation and meals. The principal aim of th is year?s meeting is to address the challenges of environmental conservation at the regional and global level. The objectives of the meeting are to formulate strategies and define priority actions for bird and biodiversity conservation for the years 2013-2 017 to evaluate the progress of the last five years and the global state of the bird conservation to launch a programme to prevent the extinction of the endangered birds and to plan cooperation with responsible enterprises.
